name: Radiation Surg Seq
title: RX Summ Surgery/Radiation Sequence
notes: See the [SEER Program Coding Manual](https://seer.cancer.gov/tools/codingmanuals/index.html) for coding instructions.
rows: No radiation and/or no surgery; unknown if surgery and/or radiation given
Radiation both before and after surgery
Intraoperative radiation with other radiation given before and/or after surgery
Surgery both before and after radiation
Sequence unknown, but both surgery and radiation were given
